description:
"I'm sweating from head to toe right now!"

"Definitely got a pretty good workout," he said.
Brodie had a big grin on his face.
The day had started with the two of them horsing around a little bit.
Even though Jason is kind of shy, he took the lead, licking Brodie's armpit.
Then he made his way down to Brodie's cock, where things got interesting!
Jason deep throated Brodie until tears came out of his eyes!
"His cock is perfect," Jason said, smiling at Brodie.
Jason's facial expressions were really interesting... they were kind of a mix between surprise and pleasure as Brodie pounded his ass!
title: Jason & Brodie
